name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Productivity Filter - Block Distractions & Filter Channels

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Only allow videos from your favorite channels and block YouTube Shorts. Stay Focused!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take Control of Your YouTube Experience with YouTube Channel Filter!  

Tired of distractions on YouTube? The YouTube Channel Filter extension lets you create a personalized list of allowed channels, ensuring you only see videos from creators you trust and love. Say goodbye to distractions and focus on the content that truly matters to you.

Key Features :

✅ Customizable Allowed Channels List  
Effortlessly add or remove channels. Videos from unapproved channels are automatically blocked, giving you a distraction-free experience.  

✅ Block YouTube Shorts  
Instantly block all YouTube Shorts to stay away from quick distractions and focus on in-depth, long-form content.  

✅ Enhanced Content Filtering  
Filter videos based on your preferences and enjoy a curated YouTube feed tailored to your goals.  

✅ Stay Focused & Productive  
Perfect for learners, professionals, and explorers who want to avoid unnecessary content and stay aligned with their objectives.  

Why Choose YouTube Channel Filter?  
This extension puts you in control, transforming YouTube into a tool for productivity and growth. Whether you're here to learn, explore, or simply cut through the noise, YouTube Channel Filter helps you create a focused and meaningful experience.  

Start your distraction-free journey today—download YouTube Channel Filter and reclaim your YouTube feed!
